thread.title: C Spire to offer iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus on September 25
thread.title_full: C Spire to offer iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus on September 25

author: admin
title: C Spire to offer iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus on September 25
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/9/2015 @ 3:51 PM   C Spire 
RIDGELAND, Miss., Sept. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- C Spire will offer the iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus, the most advanced iPhones ever, beginning Friday, September 25. Customers can pre-order iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus beginning at 2:00 a.m. CST on Saturday, September 12 at www.cspire.com/iphone6s and via phone through Customer Telesales at 1.855.CSPIRE5. For more information on the iPhone, please visit www.apple.com/iphone . For more information on C Spire products and services, please visit www.cspire.com . 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150428/212389LOGO 
About C Spire C Spire is a diversified telecommunications and technology services company that provides world-class, customer-inspired wireless communications, 1 Gigabit consumer Internet access as well as a full suite of dedicated Internet, wireless, IP Voice, data and cloud services for businesses. This news release and other announcements are available at www.cspire.com/news . For more information about C Spire, visit www.cspire.com or follow us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/cspire or Twitter at www.twitter.com/cspire . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/c-spire-to-offer-iphone-6s-and-iphone-6s-plus-on-september-25-300140439.html 
SOURCE C Spire
